subject: Enhance calculator with explanations, tooltips, and variable display
body:
Major improvements to calculator transparency and usability:

Features Added:
- Clickable tooltips: Interactive info icons (â“˜) throughout the interface
  - Input fields show detailed parameter explanations and context
  - Metric cards display calculation methods and benchmarks
  - Model info shows formulas, methodology, and use cases
- Calculation explanations: Comprehensive CALCULATION_EXPLANATIONS object
  - Formulas for all 20 revenue models
  - Step-by-step methodology descriptions
  - Key metrics and use cases for each model
- Variables summary panel: Display all inputs used in calculations
  - Shows formatted values for transparency
  - Available in both single and comparison modes
  - Clickable info icons on each variable
- Zero value support: Intelligent validation for realistic scenarios
  - Allow zero for optional variables (startingCustomers, expansionRate)
  - Context-aware warnings (zero customers + zero base)
  - Maintain errors for nonsensical zeros (price = 0)

Technical Changes:
- Added tooltip modal component with backdrop and close functionality
- Updated input form generation with clickable info icons
- Enhanced metric cards to use onclick instead of title attribute
- Created displayVariablesSummary() function for input transparency
- Modified validation rules to support zero values appropriately
- Updated README with new features documentation

Files Modified:
- app.js: Core functionality, tooltips, validation, displays
- index.html: Tooltip modal structure
- README.md: Documentation of new features

All changes maintain backward compatibility and improve user experience
without breaking existing functionality.
